name: Pee in Horror
description:
This is small horror game made in Gamemaker studio 2 from "no-skill developer-CZ"

 You want to pee but frightning monsters from darkness noticed you 

Will you successfully pee and go to sleep or will the monsters get you ?!

Pee like your life depends on it , don't get killed by monsters  

*Dangerous*

 All souns are from YouTube no copyright

 I hope you enjoy it

 Some info :

-! if you exit you save the game

Hint

-green monster "Viktor" outside of house can be scared away by closing the window when its right in front of it

- the "Rake" monster inside can be scared away by light when you see it's eyes
